answers.answer: Of course your going to worry!Did he give you a medical name for this condition?I would ask questions until his ear fell off!!Most doctors do a routine diabetes test at about 26 weeks at least they do in Canada

question: HI I have a question.  I was at the doctor for an ultrasound and he said the baby had fluid on his kidney.  He said not to worry that he has seen it before and in 2 months he will do another ultrasound.  Of course you worry has anyone had this before.  I read a little about it and it doesn't sound like anything not to worry about.  He also suggested I get a diabetes test.  Any comments will be appreciated. I am 22 weeks 5 days.Brenda
title: Fluid on a babys kidney
